This guide is a simplified overview of all the changes in the [[Better Together Update]] ({{BE}} 1.2.x releases), which assumes at least some familiarity with the [[Discovery Update]] (''Bedrock Edition'' 1.1.x releases).

==Mobs==
===New===
{| {{Simple Guide table|New Mobs}} 
|-
|[[Parrot]]
|{{Animate|Red Parrot.png; Blue Parrot.png; Green Parrot.png; Cyan Parrot.png; Gray Parrot.png|128px}}
|
* {{BiomeLink|Jungle}}
|{{Drop|Item|Feather|1|2}}
|
* Passive creatures can be tamed using [[Wheat Seeds|seeds]].
* Has the ability to fly and occasionally rest on the ground.
* If there is music playing from a [[record player]] nearby, they will dance accordingly.
** Will dance even if they are on the player's shoulders.
* They will die after eating a [[cookie]].
|}

===Changed===
{| {{Simple Guide table|Changed Mobs}} 
|-
|All [[mob]]s
|
|
* Now avoids cactus, fire and lava.
* Adjusted the color it flashes when attacked.
* Increased stride stability when moving up stairs while riding certain creatures.
|-
|[[Mooshroom]]
|[[File:Red Mooshroom JE2 BE1.png|128px]]
|Now only generates above [[mycelium]].
|-
|[[Witch]]
|[[File:Witch BE Revision 2.png|128px]]
|
* A potion of fire resistance will be drunk when standing on top of a [[magma block]].
* There is now an 8.5% chance of dropping the potion you are taking when killed. Before this, they always dropped potions.
|-
|[[Skeleton]], [[stray]] and [[zombie pigman]]
|{{Animate|Skeleton JE4 BE2.png; Stray BE2.png; Zombified Piglin JE3 BE2.png|x128px}}
|Now has a chance to spawn with enchanted tools and weapons.
|-
|[[Ender dragon]]
|[[File:Ender Dragon.gif|128px]]
|Corresponding particles will now appear when stopping using dragon breath attack.
|-
|[[Sheep]]
|{{Animate|White Sheep JE2 BE5.png; Orange Sheep BE4.png; Magenta Sheep BE4.png; Light Blue Sheep BE4.png; Yellow Sheep BE4.png; Lime Sheep BE4.png; Pink Sheep BE4.png; Gray Sheep BE4.png; Light Gray Sheep BE4.png; Cyan Sheep BE4.png; Purple Sheep BE4.png; Blue Sheep BE4.png; Blue Sheep BE4.png; Brown Sheep BE4.png; Red Sheep BE4.png; Black Sheep BE4.png|128px}}
|Shorn sheep no longer drop [[wool]] when killed.
|-
|Adult [[polar bear]]
|[[File:Polar Bear JE1 BE1.png|128px]]
|Panic now appears when on fire.
|-
|[[Villager]]
|[[File:Farmer.png|128px]]
|
* Peasant villagers now sell 5-7 [[apples]] for 1 [[emerald]].
* Observe new offers from villagers more quickly after trading is unlocked.
|-
|[[Horse]]
|[[File:Black Horse Revision 4.gif|128px]]
|
* Eating or drinking something while riding a horse no longer slows the player down.
* Updated appearance.
* No longer opens its mouth when dropping a player or taking damage.
|-
|[[Donkey]]
|[[File:Donkey JE4.png|128px]]
|
* Updated appearance.
* No longer opens its mouth when dropping a player or taking damage.
|-
|[[Mule]]
|[[File:Mule JE4.png|128px]]
|Updated appearance.
|-
|[[Skeleton horse]]
|{{Animate|Skeleton Horse 17w45a.png; Saddled Skeleton Horse.png|128px}}
|Can now be saddled.
|-
|[[Snow golem]]
|{{Animate|Snow Golem JE1 BE1.png; Sheared Snow Golem JE1 BE1.png|128px}}
|
* Snow golem's face is now only visible when clipped.
* [[Lingering water bottle]] now deals damage to it.
|-
|[[Ghast]]
|{{Animate|Ghast JE1 BE1.gif; Ghast shooting JE1 BE1.png|x128px}}
|[[Ghast fireball]] activates [[Nether portal]] when it hits it.
|-
|[[Blaze]] and [[enderman]]
|{{Animate|Blaze BE2.png; Enderman BE.png|x128px}}
|[[Lingering water bottle]] now deals damage to it.
|-
|[[Cow]]
|[[File:Cow JE4 BE1.png|128px]]
|Players will no longer drink the milk directly after milking the cow.
|}

|[[File:Coarse Dirt JE1 BE1.png|84px]]
|
{{Crafting
|A2= Dirt
|A3= Gravel
|B2= Gravel

* [[Grass]] and [[mycelium]] cannot spread to coarse dirt.
* Use [[hoe]] on coarse dirt to turn it into soil.

|{{Animate|Structure Block JE2 BE1.png; Structure Block Save JE2 BE1.png; Structure Block Load JE2 BE1.png; Structure Block Corner JE2 BE1.png; Structure Block Data JE2 BE1.png; Structure Block Export BE1.png|84px}}

|Is only available in [[Windows 10 Edition]] and has a 3D export mode that cannot be changed.

|[[File:Observer BE2.png|84px]]

==Items==
===New===
{|{{Simple Guide table|New Items}} 
|-
|[[Armor stand]]
|[[File:Armor Stand (item) JE1 BE1.png|84px]]
|
{{Crafting
|A1= Stick |B1= Stick |C1= Stick
            |B2= Stick
|A3= Stick |B3= Smooth Stone Slab |C3= Stick
|Output= Armor Stand
}}
|
* Used to place items and armor that need to be displayed.
* Can hold items without commands.
* Several postures can be switched through sneaking and interaction (right click by default).
* Redstone signals can also change posture.
|-
|[[Book and quill]]
|[[File:Book and Quill JE1 BE1.png|84px]]
|
{{Crafting
|Book
|Ink Sac
|Feather
|Output= Book and Quill
|type= Miscellaneous
}}
|
* Used for writing content and can be saved as a book.
* Two pages can be displayed on the same screen.
* Has an edit button to modify the text on each page.
|-
|[[Firework star]]
|[[File:Firework Star JE1 BE1.png|84px]]
|
{{Crafting
   |head=1
   |showname=0
   |ingredients=[[Gunpowder]]+<br>Corresponding [[Dye]]+<br>Additional materials (optional)
   |Gunpowder
   |Matching Dye
   |Head; Gold Nugget; Feather;Fire Charge;
   |;Glowstone Dust; ;Glowstone Dust<!--Offset the length of glowstone dust and diamond to make them cycle out of sync with the other ingredients-->

   |Output=Matching Firework Star
   |type=Miscellaneous
}}
{{Crafting
   |ignoreusage=1
   |Matching Firework Star
   |Any Dye
   |Output=Matching Firework Star
   |type=Miscellaneous
   |foot=1
}}

|-

===Changed===
{|{{Simple Guide table|Changed Items}} 
|-
|All items
|
|Items can now pass upward through solid blocks, allowing for a 3×3 item lift<!--? -->.
|-
|[[Bucket]]
|[[File:Bucket JE1 BE1.png|84px]]
|Only one iron barrel can now be placed in the furnace at a time.
|-
|[[Map]]
|[[File:Map (item) JE1 BE1.png|84px]]
|
* The player's head will appear on the map.
* Locator maps now track the owner's location regardless of their dimension.
* Empty maps can now be combined with a compass in an anvil to create a locator map.
* Renaming maps and increasing map size in Anvil now only costs experience levels.
* Maps and locator maps can now be obtained via /give.
|-
|[[Leash]]
|[[File:Lead JE1 BE1.png|84px]]
|
* Right click to release the leash.
* There is now a sound when placing leashes.
|}

===Changed===
{|{{Simple Guide table|Changed Non-mob entities}}
|-
|[[Arrow]]
|[[File:Arrow JE2 BE1.png|84px]]

|}

==Gameplay==
===Changed===
{| {{Simple Guide table|Changed Gameplay}} 
|-
|[[Creative mode]]
|Pressing {{key|A}} in the creative mode inventory will place an item into [[inventory]] instead of a group. Pressing {{key|Y}} will drop the entire group; pressing {{key|X}} will clear the shortcut bar in creative mode.
|-
|[[Inventory]]
|
* 3 new buttons for classic UI: "Inventory only", "Inventory and recipe book" and "Recipe book only".
* Add a switch to the recipe book to switch to full-screen creative mode [[inventory]].
|-
|[[Mob spawning|Spawn]]
|Increased the spawn rate of friendly mobs, making them easier to spot.
|}
